import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Header = () => { const [isMenuOpen, setIsMenuOpen] = useState(false); const cartCount = 4; // shows as Cart(04) const Gold = "text-[#E6C481]"; // gold text const GoldHover = "hover:text-white"; const Navy = "bg-[#0F1C2D]"; // deep navy background return (
{/* desktop/top bar */}
{/* Left — Nav */}
Home Shop {/* caret */} Best Collection Contact Us
{/* Mobile: hamburger (left-aligned in small screens) */} {/* Right — Icons + Cart */}
{/* User */} {/* Wishlist */} {/* Cart + label */} {`Cart(${String(cartCount).padStart(2, "0")})`}
{/* Centered logo overlapping bottom */}
{/* Mobile dropdown */} {isMenuOpen && (
setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`block ${Gold} ${GoldHover} font-medium`}>Home setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`block ${Gold} ${GoldHover} font-medium`}>Shop setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`block ${Gold} ${GoldHover} font-medium`}>Best Collection setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`block ${Gold} ${GoldHover} font-medium`}>Contact Us
setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`${Gold} ${GoldHover}`}>Account setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`${Gold} ${GoldHover}`}>Wishlist setIsMenuOpen(false)} className={`${Gold} ${GoldHover}`}> {`Cart(${String(cartCount).padStart(2, "0")})`}
)}
); }; export default Header;
